Title: Includes avoidant/restrictive food intake disorders as eating disorders for the purposes of mental health
Summary: Includes avoidant/restrictive food intake disorders as eating disorders for the purposes of mental health.
LawCode: Amd ยง30.02, Ment Hyg L; amd ยง207, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the public health law, in relation to including avoidant/restrictive food intake disorders as eating disorders for the purposes of mental health
